Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Irving Park/Keeler
ShortDescription: EB 80 Irving Park buses rerouted via Irving Park, Kilpatrick, Milwaukee, Cicero, Montrose, Elston, and Irving Park due to,street blockage nr Irving Park/Keeler.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #80 Irving Park buses rerouted via Irving Park, Kilpatrick, Milwaukee, Cicero, Montrose, Elston, and Irving Park due to,street blockage near Irving Park/Keeler.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/28th
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 26th, Central Park, 31st, and Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/28th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, 26th, Central Park, 31st, and Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/28th.

Allow extra travel time.
